books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend.
books.name: IT STARTS WITH US

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Gabrielle Zevin
books.description: Two friends find their partnership challenged in the world of video game design.
books.name: TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The eighth book in the Torpedo Ink series. A member of the motorcycle club helps an investment banker deal with thugs attempting to coerce her into marriage.
books.name: RECOVERY ROAD

books.author: by James Patterson and Mike Lupica
books.description: After her father is murdered, Jenny Wolf becomes the head of a powerful family in California.
books.name: THE HOUSE OF WOLVES

books.author: by Ana Reyes
books.description: Seven years after witnessing her best friend drop dead, Maya returns to her Berkshires hometown to piece together what happened.
books.name: THE HOUSE IN THE PINES

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A fictional oral history charting the rise and fall of a ’70s rock ’n’ roll band.
books.name: DAISY JONES & THE SIX

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Barbara Kingsolver
books.description: A reimagining of Charles Dickens’s “David Copperfield” set in the mountains of southern Appalachia.
books.name: DEMON COPPERHEAD

books.author: by Brad Taylor
books.description: The 17th book in the Pike Logan series. Pike must stop a man seeking to upset the global balance of power.
books.name: THE DEVIL'S RANSOM

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Two childhood friends follow in their fathers’ footsteps, which puts them on opposite sides of the law.
books.name: THE BOYS FROM BILOXI
